thread.title: Rani Padmini's trailer, a curiosity-triggerer
thread.title_full: Rani Padmini's trailer, a curiosity-triggerer - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Rani Padmini's trailer, a curiosity-triggerer
text:
The trailer of Aashiq Abu's much-awaited lady flick Rani Padmini was recently released and it hints that the movie can be expected to be a 'style-and-substance' film.
Featured on the characters of Rima Kallingal and Manju Warrier, the movie shows both the State Award winners in classy looks and cahracterisations. Rani Padmini also has Sajitha Madhathil, Sreenath Bhasi and Sana Althaf in pivotal roles.
